backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing e-commerce functionality including user profiles, products, categories, cart, wishlist, orders, coupons, referrals, Stripe integration, admin authorization, and blob storage with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that initializes sample products and categories if the old actor state is empty, preserving existing data otherwise.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, pages, routing, authentication, catalog, cart, orders, admin features, and error handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including sidebar, chart, and UI component tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, theme color, and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/public/offline.html: Empty offline fallback HTML file (no content).
frontend/public/sw.js: Empty service worker JavaScript file (no content).
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation describing features, application routes (public, user, admin, payment), tech stack, and local development setup instructions.
frontend/scripts/clean-build.sh: Bash script that performs a clean build by removing caches, reinstalling dependencies, running type checks, and building the application with post-deployment validation checklist.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes (public, user, admin), ThemeProvider, TranslationProvider, Toaster, error boundaries, and service worker cleanup on mount.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryEd: Dialog component for adding or editing product categories with name and image upload (data URL) support, including validation, error handling, and retry functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog component for adding or editing products with fields for name, description, price, stock, category selection, and image upload (data URL), including validation and error handling with retry capability.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: Admin configuration page for setting up Stripe payment integration by entering secret key and allowed country codes, displaying current configuration status.
frontend/src/components/category/Categor: Reusable image component that displays category images with fallback to placeholder on error or missing URL, supporting both remote URLs and data URLs.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorF: Error fallback UI component that displays a user-friendly error message with a refresh button when the application encounters an unexpected error.
frontend/src/components/errors/RootError: React error boundary class component that catches uncaught errors in the component tree and displays the AppErrorFallback component.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Carousel component displaying two rotating home page banner images with navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Grid component displaying product categories as clickable cards with images, loading skeletons, error handling with retry, and navigation to catalog filtered by category.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout component that wraps the application with header, footer, and outlet for nested routes.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component displaying company info, quick links, social media icons, copyright notice, and attribution to caffeine.ai with dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Main navigation header component with logo, search, cart/wishlist badges, theme/language switchers, and authentication controls. Includes responsive mobile menu and enforces BISAULI branding.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Reusable skeleton loading components for product cards, product grids, category cards, and order rows using shadcn/ui Skeleton primitives.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Product card component displaying product image, name, price, stock status, and add-to-cart button. Links to product detail page and shows out-of-stock badge when applicable.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Image component for product display with fallback to placeholder on error or missing URL. Handles both remote URLs and data URLs with lazy loading.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSInstallP: Empty file for Add-to-Home-Screen PWA install prompt component.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineBanne: Empty file for offline status banner component.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorDas: Empty file for vendor dashboard component.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorLog: Empty file for vendor login form component.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: Empty file for vendor product editor dialog component.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/usePlaceOrd: React Query mutation hook for placing orders with shipping address. Invalidates cart, orders, dashboard stats, and products queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Centralized query key definitions for React Query, separating public/shopper keys from admin-scoped keys for products, categories, cart, orders, and settings.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminCatal: Admin-scoped hooks for managing products and categories (CRUD operations) using admin actor. Invalidates both admin and public product/category queries on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminHealt: Admin health check hook using anonymous admin actor to verify backend canister availability. Polls every 30 seconds and returns health status.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminOrder: Hooks for fetching all orders and updating order status using public actor. Invalidates admin orders, customer orders, and dashboard stats on status updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Authorization hooks for checking caller user role and admin status using authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: Hooks for cart and wishlist operations (get, add, increment, decrement, remove) requiring authentication. Handles backend unavailability errors and invalidates cart/wishlist queries on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching products and categories from the public actor with timeout handling, error formatting, and caching strategies.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Exports a React Query hook to fetch all coupons using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useDashboardS: Provides a React Query hook to fetch dashboard statistics (total orders and revenue) using the admin actor with timeout and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching customer orders and individual order details with polling intervals.
Provides a React Query hook to fetch user referrals using the authenticated actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSiteSettin: Exports hooks for fetching and updating site settings, enforcing 'BISAULI' as the shop name with caching and refetch strategies.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Provides React Query hooks and mutations for checking Stripe configuration status and setting Stripe configuration via admin actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor based on Internet Identity, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Wraps useActor to provide an admin-specific actor hook requiring Internet Identity authentication and admin role.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Custom hook to dynamically update the document title, defaulting to 'BISAULI' if no title is provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicActor.ts: Creates and manages an anonymous public actor for read-only catalog access without authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Wraps next-themes useTheme hook to provide theme state and setter with dark mode detection.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Implements internationalization context and translations for English and Hindi languages covering navigation, products, cart, checkout, orders, profile, admin, and common UI strings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm color palette for light and dark modes, including colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin page for managing product categories with CRUD operations (add, edit, delete). Includes backend availability detection, error handling with retry functionality, and confirmation dialogs for deletions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Basic admin page displaying coupon count and management interface placeholder. Currently shows loading state and total coupon count.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard displaying statistics and product overview with refresh functionality. Handles authentication errors and provides retry mechanisms for failed data fetches.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Admin panel layout with sidebar navigation, backend health status indicator, and session management. Provides menu items for all admin sections and displays backend availability status with retry options.
Admin authentication page using Internet Identity with role verification. Handles login flow, clears stale sessions, and redirects to admin dashboard upon successful admin role verification.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin page for viewing and managing all orders with status updates, sorting by timestamp, and error handling with retry functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page for managing products with search, sorting, CRUD operations (add, edit, delete), and a confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin page for updating site branding settings, specifically the shop logo (with image upload, validation, and data URL conversion).
Placeholder admin page for user management features that are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page displaying cart items with quantity controls (increment/decrement), product details, subtotal calculation, and checkout navigation. Requires user authentication and handles empty cart states.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Product catalog page with filtering (category, price range, search), sorting, and URL-synced state. Displays products in a grid with loading skeletons and error handling with retry functionality.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page with shipping address form validation (name, phone, address, pincode), order summary display, and order placement functionality. Redirects to order confirmation on success.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring a banner carousel, featured products section (first 8 products), and categories grid with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Order confirmation page displaying success message with order ID and navigation buttons to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Customer-facing page displaying all orders for the logged-in user with order status badges and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Customer-facing page showing detailed information for a specific order including items, status, date, and total amount.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Payment failure page showing error message with options to retry payment or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Payment success page displaying confirmation message with navigation to orders or home page.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product information including image, name, price, description, and stock status. Allows authenticated users to add products to cart or wishlist with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Placeholder profile page for address management features that are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Layout wrapper for profile pages with tabbed navigation (overview, addresses, settings) and authentication check.
User settings page for toggling dark mode theme and selecting language (English or Hindi).
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorPage.tsx: Empty vendor page file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows user's wishlist with product cards, requiring authentication to view. Displays empty state with navigation to catalog if no items exist.
frontend/src/utils/adminSessionReset.ts: Utility function to clear all admin session data by removing localStorage, sessionStorage, and expiring accessible cookies.
frontend/src/utils/backendAvailabilityEr: Provides utility functions to detect and format backend canister unavailability errors (IC0508, network issues, deployment problems) into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Shared utilities for order status presentation including label mapping, badge color variants, and available status options for admin dropdowns.
frontend/src/utils/serviceWorker.ts: Utility function to unregister all service workers to prevent PWA behavior from affecting page performance.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for parsing URL parameters from query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended theme properties, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document indicating an e-commerce app with empty products/categories data requiring backend data fetching fixes and sample data population.
